languages.text: {n}Эльдарка отворачивается, но перед самым уходом вновь обращается к вам:{/n} "Не принимай мои слова близко к сердцу. Нет ничего зазорного в том, чтобы мыслить так же типично, как твои сородичи. Куда сложнее идти отличным от всех путем".

{n}The Aeldari turns away, but before she leaves she looks at you once more:{/n} "Do not take my words to heart. There is no shame in thinking as others of your kind do. It is much more difficult to follow a different path from the rest."
languages.original_text: {n}Эльдарка отворачивается, но перед самым уходом вновь обращается к вам:{/n} "Не принимай мои слова близко к сердцу. Нет ничего зазорного в том, чтобы мыслить так же типично, как твои сородичи. Куда сложнее идти отличным от всех путем".

traits.locale_text: {n}The Aeldari turns away, but before she leaves she looks at you once more:{/n} "Do not take my words to heart. There is no shame in thinking as others of your kind do. It is much more difficult to follow a different path from the rest."

{n}The Aeldari turns away, but before she leaves she looks at you once more:{/n} "Do not take my words to heart. There is no shame in thinking as others of your kind do. It is much more difficult to follow a different path from the rest."

{n}The Aeldari turns away, but before she leaves she looks at you once more:{/n} "Do not take my words to heart. There is no shame in thinking as others of your kind do. It is much more difficult to follow a different path from the rest."

{n}The Aeldari turns away, but before she leaves she looks at you once more:{/n} "Do not take my words to heart. There is no shame in thinking as others of your kind do. It is much more difficult to follow a different path from the rest."

languages.text: {n}La Aeldari te da la espalda, pero antes de marcharse te dedica una última mirada.{/n} «No te tomes a pecho mis palabras. No es deshonroso pensar como los tuyos piensan. Lo verdaderamente difícil es recorrer una senda distinta a los demás.»
languages.original_text: {n}The Aeldari turns away, but before she leaves she looks at you once more:{/n} "Do not take my words to heart. There is no shame in thinking as others of your kind do. It is much more difficult to follow a different path from the rest."

traits.locale_text: {n}La Aeldari te da la espalda, pero antes de marcharse te dedica una última mirada.{/n} «No te tomes a pecho mis palabras. No es deshonroso pensar como los tuyos piensan. Lo verdaderamente difícil es recorrer una senda distinta a los demás.»

languages.text: {n}アエルダリは背を向けたが、立ち去る前にもう一度こちらを見た。{/n}「我の言葉を真に受けるな。血族と同じ考えを持つことは悪いことではない。他と異なる道を歩むというのは、得てして難しいものだ」
languages.original_text: {n}The Aeldari turns away, but before she leaves she looks at you once more:{/n} "Do not take my words to heart. There is no shame in thinking as others of your kind do. It is much more difficult to follow a different path from the rest."

traits.locale_text: {n}アエルダリは背を向けたが、立ち去る前にもう一度こちらを見た。{/n}「我の言葉を真に受けるな。血族と同じ考えを持つことは悪いことではない。他と異なる道を歩むというのは、得てして難しいものだ」

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特转身打算离开，在临走之际又回头看了你一眼。{/n}“不必将我的话放在心上，与同类拥有同样的想法并不可耻。与众不同的道路，不是那么好走的。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Aeldari turns away, but before she leaves she looks at you once more:{/n} "Do not take my words to heart. There is no shame in thinking as others of your kind do. It is much more difficult to follow a different path from the rest."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特转身打算离开，在临走之际又回头看了你一眼。{/n}“不必将我的话放在心上，与同类拥有同样的想法并不可耻。与众不同的道路，不是那么好走的。”

languages.text: {n}L'Aeldari se détourne, non sans vous lancer un dernier regard avant de partir.{/n} « Ne prenez pas mes paroles trop à cœur. Il n'y a nulle honte à penser comme ses semblables. Il est bien plus difficile de suivre une voie différente des autres. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Aeldari turns away, but before she leaves she looks at you once more:{/n} "Do not take my words to heart. There is no shame in thinking as others of your kind do. It is much more difficult to follow a different path from the rest."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'Aeldari se détourne, non sans vous lancer un dernier regard avant de partir.{/n} « Ne prenez pas mes paroles trop à cœur. Il n'y a nulle honte à penser comme ses semblables. Il est bien plus difficile de suivre une voie différente des autres. »

languages.text: {n}Die Aeldari wendet sich zum Gehen, blickt dann jedoch noch einmal zu dir:{/n} "Nehmt Euch meine Worte nicht zu Herzen. Es ist keine Schande, so zu denken wie andere Eures Volks. Es ist sehr viel schwieriger, einen anderen Pfad zu befolgen als andere."
languages.original_text: {n}The Aeldari turns away, but before she leaves she looks at you once more:{/n} "Do not take my words to heart. There is no shame in thinking as others of your kind do. It is much more difficult to follow a different path from the rest."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Aeldari wendet sich zum Gehen, blickt dann jedoch noch einmal zu dir:{/n} "Nehmt Euch meine Worte nicht zu Herzen. Es ist keine Schande, so zu denken wie andere Eures Volks. Es ist sehr viel schwieriger, einen anderen Pfad zu befolgen als andere."

languages.text: {n}Aeldari, arkasını dönüyor ve gitmeden önce sana bir kez daha bakıyor.{/n} "Söylediklerimi fazla ciddiye alma. Kendi türünden olanlarla benzer şekilde düşünmek, utanılacak bir şey değildir. Diğerlerinden farklı bir yola baş koymak, oldukça zordur."
languages.original_text: {n}The Aeldari turns away, but before she leaves she looks at you once more:{/n} "Do not take my words to heart. There is no shame in thinking as others of your kind do. It is much more difficult to follow a different path from the rest."

traits.locale_text: {n}Aeldari arkasını dönüyor. Gitmeden önce sana tekrar bakıyor.{/n} "Söylediklerimi fazla ciddiye alma. Kendi türünden olanlarla benzer şekilde düşünmek utanılacak bir şey değildir. Diğerlerinden farklı bir yola baş koymak oldukça zordur."
